name: Numb3r Stations
description:
Numb3r Stations is a solo roleplaying game inspired by the Cold War, spies, secret messages and the subtleties of communication. 

During play you will take on the role of a spy sent to infiltrate enemy territory in order to undertake an important mission. Using real life number stations you will complete each stage of your mission and relay information to your unseen handler through a series of messages that outline your progress and inform them of what you have learned.

But beware, success comes at a price. Counter-intelligence agents seek to discover your identity and completing your mission risks exposing the operation.

This is currently an ashcan version. Any and all feedback on the game is greatly appreciated and will help improve the final version of the game.

A small number of print copies of the ashcan will be available from the LunarShadow Designs stand at Dragonmeet on the 3rd of December in London, UK.
